mapper.insert: insert into customer(customer_no, customer_id, customer_contact, customer_join, customer_purchase, customer_mileage, customer_level) values(customer_seq.nextval, #{customerId}, #{customerContact}, #{customerJoin}, #{customerPurchase}, #{customerMileage}, #{customerLevel})
mapper.select: select * from customer where instr(${type}, #{keyword}) > 0 order by ${type} asc
